name: The Inner World - The Last Wind Monk
description: The flute nose dynasty has been watching over Asposia for centuries on end. In secret, they fill the roly-poly world with light and life. Emil, a trader for odds and ends, has led all the Asposians astray, making them believe that the dynasty is in cahoots with dark forces.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Windows 8 Classic Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atomâ„¢ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c-compatible graphics card with 256 MB VRAM and PixelShader 3.0 support Storage: 4 GB available space
